string.value: #b#p9270058##k's daddy is planning to invite 50 most close friends to his birthday party. #b#p9270058##k suggested an idea of giving them with rare gift at the party. What would be the perfect gift to all of the guests?

#b#p9270058##k thought of #b#t4000470##k as a special gift to all guests to her daddy's birthday party. She now needs #b50 #t4000470##k before the party begins. 

#o9420532# #r#a45541##k 
#t4000470# #r#c4000470#/50#k
#b#t4000470##k was a superb gift and every guests who came to birthday party of #b#p9270058##k's daddy were surprised at the unexpected gift and had a jolly time together.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 16,000 Able to proceed to 'Unexpected Guest' as next quest.
My daddy is planning to throw a big birthday party that would include all of his best friends. And I thought maybe some sort of surprise gift for the guests would make the party even more exciting.

They would be thrilled to receive #b#t4000470##k as a surprise gift because they're such a rare item. Where could I get them? Would you help me to get #b50 #t4000470##k from #b#o9420532##k for 50 guests?
While you're hunting #b#o9420532##k you should be really careful. They aren't as weak as you 'd think.
It will make this party so much fun. Just imagine all those surprised faces! Don't you want to help me?
Wow, that was quick! Now, I have enough time to gift wrap them before the party. Thanks!
It will be so much fun to watch all those surprised faces. Don't you think? Haha!
#b#o9420532##k could be dangerous, but I desperately need those #b#t4000470##k...
#b#o9420532##k could be dangerous, but I desperately need those #b#t4000470##k...
